Module com.example.addressbook
Package com.example.addressbook.model

Interface IArtDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteArtDAO
public interface IArtDAO
Interface for the Art Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Art class with the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addArt(Art art)
    Adds a new Art Piece to the database.
    void
    deleteArt(Art art)
    Deletes a contact from the database.
    List<Art>
    getAllArt()
    Retrieves all contacts from the database.
    Art
    getArt(int id)
    Retrieves a contact from the database.
    void
    updateArt(Art art)
    Updates an existing contact in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addArt

      void addArt(Art art)
      Adds a new Art Piece to the database.
      Parameters:
      art - The contact to add.

    • updateArt

      void updateArt(Art art)
      Updates an existing contact in the database.
      Parameters:
      art - The contact to update.

    • deleteArt

      void deleteArt(Art art)
      Deletes a contact from the database.
      Parameters:
      art - The contact to delete.

    • getArt

      Art getArt(int id)
      Retrieves a contact from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the art to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The contact with the given art, or null if not found.

    • getAllArt

      List<Art> getAllArt()
      Retrieves all contacts from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all contacts in the database.
